product.title: VEVOR Drywall Stilts 18 in. to 30 in. Adjustable Aluminum Tool Stilts Durable and Non-slip Work Stilts
product.description: VEOVR Drywall Stilts. Do your legs hurt after long hours of standing and completing tough projects. Well, get ready to treat your body right! VEVOR provides you with high-strength drywall stilts, which will be your new friends for working at various heights indoors or outdoors. The sturdy aluminum alloy material, shock-absorbing springs, and non-slip bases will ensure a balanced and stable standing and walking experience for years to come. Reach high with VEVOR.
feature_bullets: Dual shock-absorbing springs provide optimum stability
Adjustment from 24 to 41 inches to meet various working needs
Adjustable height from 18 in. to 30 in. for versatile use
descriptive_attributes: Sturdy aluminum alloy: get ready for more support, VEVOR's drywall stilts can easily hold up to 228 lbs. made of robust aluminum alloy, featuring rust-proof, non-deformed, and optimal stability performance. Get ready to set the standard, in addition, you no longer have to worry about breakage due to its long service life

Set the perfect height: are you tired of restrictions, adjust to any challenge effortlessly, through the screws, you get an easy height adjustment from 24 in. to 40 in. to meet various working needs, additionally, thanks to the 3-position heel bracket design, our aluminum tool stilts accommodate most foot sizes ranging from 10.6 in. to 11.4 in., ensuring comfortable uses for most users

Protective knee pad: the aluminum drywall stilts are upgraded with soft PVC pads, ensuring that the legs remain firmly secured without any discomfort, also, the knee straps are durable and not easy to break, which is cost-effective and provides maximum comfort, reliability and comfort are just a click away

Stability above the rest: in addition to solid nylon straps that ensure your security, the drywall walking stilts also adopt dual shock-absorbing springs to maintain your balance while you walk, so you can easily stand alone, the stilts will give you a leg up on your next big project, the bottom rubber bases increase the friction on the ground to avoid slipping and scratches

Versatile uses: join the thousands of satisfied users that are putting up drywall, painting, working in home decoration, tree pruning, electrical work, etc. our adjustable stilt tool has a light-weight construction that is effortless to adjust and recommended for professionals, take your work to the next level

Maximum load capacity: 228 lbs./103 kg, adjustable height: 18 in. to 30 in./45.7 cm to 76.2 cm, fit feet size: 10.6 in. to 11.4 in./27 cm to 29 cm, item size (H x L x W): 32 in. H x 11 in. L x 5 in. W/82.5 cm x 28 cm x 13.5 cm, item weight: 13 lbs./6 kg, frame material: aluminum alloy, base material: rubber, color: silver
Package content: 1 x drywall stilts, 1 x user manual
